alert.note: Alert for Allen; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 12:17AM CDT until June 01 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NEOSHO AND ALLEN COUNTIES... At 1216 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kincaid to 8 miles northwest of Walnut to Thayer, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of producing 75 mph winds at Chanute. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chanute, Iola, Humboldt, Erie, St. Paul, La Harpe, Gas, Moran, Thayer, Galesburg, Savonburg, Elsmore, Stark, Earlton, Mildred, Bassett, Lake Parsons, Petrolia, Chanute Airport and South Mound. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
